rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual statistics without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment discusses production and export rankings (financial/trade metrics), which are treated as Neutral per rules.
The segment reports production/export ranking but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser ('only', 'just', 'merely', 'a single', 'few') combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes US production/export ranking, not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports economic rankings ('largest producer and second-largest exporter') using standard description.
